ComicInfo.Title: Snow Death!
ComicInfo.Summary: Snow Death!: Baron Shtupf bring Man-Wolf to his castle to use him to create new monsters. Man-Wolf escapes, taking Agent Klemmer with him. Spider-Man and Frankenstein need to escape the Baron's castle once again, this time to rescue Agent Klemmer.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 15:44:55. [Issue ID 29015]
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority

ComicInfo.Inker: John Romita,Sal Buscema,Vince Colletta,Vinnie Colletta,Vinnie Colletta
